title: ICSI to Declare CS Executive & Professional Dec 2025 Results Today, February 25, 2026
content:
# ICSI to Declare CS Executive & Professional Dec 2025 Results Today, February 25, 2026

Ek important update hai. The Institute of Company Secretaries of India (ICSI) ne Company Secretary (CS) Executive & Professional Programme, December 2025 Session ke results declare karne ki date announce ki hai. Results aaj, February 25, 2026 ko release honge.

*   **Result Declaration Date:** February 25, 2026.
*   **CS Professional Programme (Syllabus 2022) Result Time:** 11:00 A.M. (IST).
*   **CS Executive Programme (Syllabus 2022) Result Time:** 02:00 P.M. (IST).
*   **Official Website for Results:** Candidates can check their results along with subject-wise break-up of marks on www.icsi.edu.
*   **Executive Programme Result-cum-Marks Statement:** The formal e-Result-cum-Marks Statement for the Executive Programme will be uploaded on the ICSI website for download. No physical copy will be issued.
*   **Professional Programme Result-cum-Marks Statement:** The Result-cum-Marks Statement for the Professional Programme will be dispatched to candidates at their registered addresses. Agar 30 din ke andar physical copy nahi milti hai, toh candidates Institute ko exam@icsi.edu par contact kar sakte hain.
*   **Next Examinations:** The next CS Professional Programme and Executive Programme examinations (Syllabus 2022) will be held from June 01, 2026, to June 07, 2026. Online submission of enrolment applications for these exams will commence from February 26, 2026.
*   **CSEET June 2026 Session:** The Restructured Company Secretaries Executive Entrance Test (CSEET) for the June 2026 session will be held from June 01, 2026, to June 04, 2026. Online submission of enrolment applications for CSEET will begin from March 01, 2026.

## Read the Official Document
* [Download the Official Notification/Circular here](https://www.icsi.edu/media/website/RESULT%20ANNOUNCEMENT.pdf)

*Published on: 25 February 2026*
